code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{API_BASE_URL}from'../apiConfig';import'./ForgotPasswordPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ForgotPasswordPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');try{const{data}=await axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/api/users/forgot-password`,{email});setMessage(data.message||'Check your email for reset link.');}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setMessage(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.error)||'Failed to send reset link.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forgot-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forgot-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Forgot Password?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Enter your email to receive a password reset link."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Your email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,className:"forgot-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"forgot-button",children:"Send Reset Link"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"forgot-message",children:message})]})});};export default ForgotPasswordPage;
